text:
Here’s what I’m looking at... they don’t know if having a vaccine reduces catching & passing the virus.  So what’s the point? 
If I get covid I’ll be fine & I know I won’t suffer so that doesn’t bother me. 
I have no valid reason to take this. 
Would you? 
#COVID19 #vaccine https://t.co/Rk0p9GfPvM
